title: Police: Teen killed in north Nashville shooting
content:
NASHVILLE, TN (WSMV) -
A 15-year-old was killed in a shooting in north Nashville on Friday afternoon.
Witnesses said that DaVontae Ziegler and two acquaintances were on the front porch of his Gwynwood Drive home when a neighbor heard a gunshot just after 3 p.m.
DaVontae ran to a nearby home on McCarthy Park Lane and asked for help. He was transported to Vanderbilt University Medical Center where he later died.
Police said one of the young men had a gun and fled on foot. Detectives are working to confirm his identity.
"The young man who fired the shot was very concerned about the victim's welfare and ran to check on him before he fled the immediate scene," said Don Aaron, Metro police spokesman.
A third person, a juvenile, is being interviewed by Metro police.
